Erik Dajer o Marakani: Jedinstven je ovaj tunel, moraš da uživaš u tome
“Ogromna pozitiva”, dodaje vezista u koži štopera

06 Nov 2019

Upoznali smo ga kao zadnjeg veznog, večeras gledali u ulozi štopera. I jeste da je bilo tu i šansi za crveno-bele, ali možemo da konstatujemo da je Erik Dajer obavio dobar posao. Uostalom, Totenhemovih 4:0 u Beogradu sve jasno govori.“Ogromna pozitiva! Želeli smo da sačuvamo mrežu netaknutom, to je bio cilj za odbranu. Šef nam je naglasio koliko će teško ovde da bude, znamo za Zvezdine rezultate iz poslednjih godina i znali smo da će biti teško”, rekao je Dajer za BT Sport.
Na kraju ipak nije bilo baš toliko teško. Oni najveći igrači od atmosfere sebi naprave užitak. Pa je tako govoreći o tunelu od svlačionica do stadiona “Rajko Mitić” Dajer rekao…“Čudan korak, nešto na šta nismo navikli. Jedinstven tunel, ta šetnja, ali to je nešto u čemu moraš da uživaš. Atmosfera je bila sjajna, sjajno je doći ovde i igrati. To je ono što čini Ligu šampiona. Veoma sam srećan što sam igrao ovde. Što sam uopšte igrao. Imamo vrlo dobar tim i uvek je teško izboriti se, ali kad dobiješ šansu moraš da je iskoristiš i nadam se da sam to uradio”, rekao je Dajer.
(FOTO: Reuters)

Eric Dyer about Marakana: This tunnel is unique, you have to enjoy it
"Huge positives," adds the midfielder in the leather of the stopper

06 Nov 2019

We met him as the last midfielder, watching tonight as a stopper. And of course there was a chance for the red and white, but we can say that Eric Dyer did a good job. After all, Tottenham's 4-0 in Belgrade says it all clearly. "Huge positives! We wanted to keep the net intact, that was the goal for the defense. The boss emphasized to us how difficult it would be here, we know about Star's results from recent years and we knew it would be difficult, ”Dyer told BT Sport.
In the end, though, it wasn't that difficult. Those biggest players of the atmosphere make it a pleasure. So speaking about the tunnel from the locker rooms to the Rajko Mitic stadium, Dyer said ... “A strange step, something we are not used to. A unique tunnel, that walk, but it's something you have to enjoy. The atmosphere was great, it's great to come here and play. This is what makes the Champions League. I'm very happy to play here. Which I played at all. We have a very good team and it's always hard to fight, but when you get a chance you have to use it and I hope I did, "Dyer said.
(PHOTO: Reuters)
